text: Ramzan Kadyrov (, ; born 5 October 1976) is a Chechen politician. He became the Head of the Chechen Republic in February 2007. He is a former Chechen rebel. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site of the Republic of Chechnya Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chechnya Category:Current national leaders Category:Heads of state Category:Muslims Category:Russian generals Category:Russian politicians Category:Russian sportspeople Category:Boxers
title: Ramzan Kadyrov
